LightningComponentBundle.description: This component adds a Copy to Clipboard button

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Label to use on the button (Optional)

property.name: clipboardContent
property.label: Clipboard Content
property.description: Set attribute to the value to pass into the Clipboard

property.name: clipboardLabel
property.label: Clipboard Label
property.description: Label to appear above the Clipboard contents box (Optional)

property.name: contentSize
property.label: Content Size (In 12ths)
property.description: Set the size of the contents box in 12ths of the total container width (Optional)

property.name: removeClipboard
property.label: Hide Clipboard Display after Selection?
property.description: Remove the clipboard contents display from the screen once the button is clicked.
